name: Sol-Gel Technologies Ltd.
description: Sol-Gel Technologies Ltd. is a clinical-stage pharmaceutical company focused on developing and commercializing innovative dermatological products. Founded in 2010, Sol-Gel is dedicated to advancing treatments for skin diseases, leveraging its proprietary technology platform. The company has developed a range of product candidates, including its lead product, which aims to treat acne vulgaris with a unique formulation that combines two well-known active ingredients. Sol-Gel's mission is to provide patients with effective, safe, and convenient treatment options while addressing unmet medical needs in dermatology. The company's research and development efforts are supported by a strong intellectual property portfolio, which allows Sol-Gel to protect its innovations and market its products effectively. In addition to acne treatments, Sol-Gel is also exploring therapies for psoriasis and other dermatological conditions. With a commitment to scientific excellence and patient care, Sol-Gel Technologies is poised to make significant contributions to the field of dermatology.
